settings.title: 1 Fill out your information
settings.description: We will share your information on our website so potential customers can contact you for test ride!

settings.title: 2 Register a dedicated account
settings.description: Click the button to complete the registration.

settings.title: 3 Activation
settings.description: Once your account is activated, you will receive an email notification.

settings.title: 4 Receive email confirmation
settings.description: Click the link in the email to sign in.

settings.title: 5 Look out
settings.description: In order to protect your rights and interests, please advise the test rider to enter through your link before making a purchase. Otherwise, we will not be able to record your order in the background.

settings.title: How do I become a test ride provider?
settings.sub_title: How will providing test rides work for me?
settings.description: When someone purchases a Mokwheel E-Bike using your code, you'll earn $100 in cash (rewards are sent via PayPal), and they’ll receive a $58 voucher to use toward Mokwheel E-Bike purchase—getting it at a lower price!

settings.title: 2 Contact
settings.description: Call ahead to confirm your model is available.

settings.title: How can I take a test ride?
settings.description:
You can test ride the Mokwheel Ebike at the Mokwheel store closest to you to find the one that best suits you.
Since it is not possible to confirm that each store can offer the model you want to test ride, you need to contact the store to confirm availability.
settings.url_info: Find test ride locations

settings.title: Test ride for the entire community

settings.faqs_question: What are the benefits of taking a test ride before purchasing an eBike?
settings.faqs_answer: Taking a test ride allows you to experience the feel and performance of different eBike models firsthand. This helps you make an informed decision about which model best suits your riding style, comfort preferences, and intended use.

settings.faqs_question: How do I schedule a test ride?
settings.faqs_answer: Just head to our Test Ride section, and choose a nearby location. Then pick a time that works for you.

settings.faqs_question: What models are available for test rides?
settings.faqs_answer: Available test ride models may vary. Please contact the test ride provider or local dealer to confirm which Mokwheel models are currently available for test rides.

settings.faqs_question: Can I place an order right after the test ride?
settings.faqs_answer: Absolutely! You can place your order online anytime, and our team will be happy to assist. If you take a test ride with one of our authorized providers, you’ll have the opportunity to receive an exclusive coupon toward your eBike purchase by using the unique link provided by the test ride provider.

settings.faqs_question: Do l need to make a reservation for a test ride?
settings.faqs_answer: It’s a good idea to contact the test ride provider in advance to check availability. Some providers may accept walk-ins, but others might have limited stock or require an appointment. Reaching out ensures an eBike will be ready for you.

settings.faqs_question: Where else can I find more information?
settings.faqs_answer: You can also visit our website’s Help Center or FAQ page for detailed info. If you still have questions, please contact our customer support team at support@mokwheel.com—our dedicated staff will be happy to assist you.

settings.faqs_question: Can I rent a Mokwheel Ebike for a day, a weekend, or longer?
settings.faqs_answer: Taking a test ride allows you to experience the feel and performance of different eBike models firsthand. This helps you make an informed decision about which model best suits your riding style, comfort preferences, and intended use.

settings.faqs_question: Are there any restrictions on where I can ride the eBike during a test ride?
settings.faqs_answer: Taking a test ride allows you to experience the feel and performance of different eBike models firsthand. This helps you make an informed decision about which model best suits your riding style, comfort preferences, and intended use.
